text: Roop — Mard Ka Naya Swaroop (English: Roop — New Form of Man) is an Indian television series that airs on Colors TV. It premiered on 28 May 2018, and is produced by Rashmi Sharma of Rashmi Sharma Telefilms Limited. ==References== Category:2018 Indian television series debuts Category:Hindi-language television series
title: Roop - Mard Ka Naya Swaroop
